participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Energetic and a bit anxious, but always ready to have fun.
participant_1.background: i'm terrified of scorpions. i'm employed by the us postal service. i have a german shepherd named barnaby. my father drove a car for nascar.

participant_2.name: Ananya
participant_2.personality: Passionate about sports and technology, with a laid-back attitude.
participant_2.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal.
